Interface ISEmaillist

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl, ISCommon, ISConnect, ISEmail, ISQuestion

    public interface ISEmaillist
extends ISQuestion
    Manages the email list objects.

      • store

        boolean store(Connection con,
            Emaillist emaillist,
            boolean deamon)
              throws SQLException
        Stores an email list.
        Parameters:
        con - the current connection
        emaillist - the Emaillist
        deamon - true if the function is called from service, false otherwise
        Returns:
        boolean true if the Emaillist was stored successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        SQLException
